[Like us on Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/greencloudvps)
[Follow us on Twitter](https://twitter.com/GreenCloudVPS)

**Why Us?**

- We have been in hosting business since 2013 with years of experience.
- Owned enterprise hardware: We own all of our hardware and network equipment. We do not use consumer grade hardware, only trusted enterprise hardware from: Supermicro, Dell, Intel, Samsung & Western Digital
- Fast ticket response with average of 20 mins.
- 24x7 In-house Professional Support
- 99.9% Network Uptime Guaranteed
- 1Gbps and 10Gbps Network Connection
- 7-day money back guarantee

____________________________________________________________________________________

**Our SSD KVM VPS features:**

- Latest hardware with Dual E5 processors and Enterprise SSD in RAID-10
- SolusVM Control Panel
- KVM Virtualization

______________________________________________________________________________________

**SSDPromo-1 - $6/mo** 
______________________________________________________________________________________

- 4096MB RAM
- 2 cores
- 25GB SSD RAID-10
- IPv4: 1
- IPv6: /112
- Network: 1Gbps
- 2TB Bandwidth
- Linux OS
- SolusVM Control Panel
- Locations: Los Angeles, CA; Sanjose, CA; Miami, FL, Toronto, ON; Amsterdam, NL
- [ORDER LA](https://greencloudvps.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=431 "ORDER LA")
- [ORDER SJ](https://greencloudvps.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=437 "ORDER SJ")

- [ORDER TOR](https://greencloudvps.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=449 "ORDER TOR")

______________________________________________________________________________________

**Our Storage KVM VPS features:**

- Latest hardware with Dual E5 processors and Enterprise SATA in RAID-10
- SolusVM Control Panel
- KVM Virtualization

______________________________________________________________________________________

**Storage1TB - $7/mo** 
______________________________________________________________________________________

- 2048MB RAM
- 1 core
- 1TB SATA RAID-10
- IPv4: 1
- IPv6: /112
- Network: 1Gbps
- 2TB Bandwidth
- Linux OS
- SolusVM Control Panel
- Locations: Bucharest, RO; Denver, CO; Atlanta, GA
